snippet: Mergers involving Merck and Idenix Pharmaceuticals, and Analog Devices and Hittite Microwave, among other companies, prompted investors to buy some stocks.
abstract: Stock market rises modestly, as several deals increase investors' enthusiasm for stocks.
lead_paragraph: Mergers involving Merck and Idenix Pharmaceuticals, and Analog Devices and Hittite Microwave, among other companies, prompted investors to buy some stocks.

headline.main: Dow and S.&P. Reach Highs On Reports of Merger Deals
headline.print_headline: Dow and S.&P. Reach Highs on Reports of Merger Deals
